verses.roman:
tabe sārvabhauma prabhura caraṇe dhariyā
'daśa-dina bhikṣā kara' kahe vinati kariyā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caraṇe dhariyā—catching the lotus feet; daśa-dina—for ten days; bhikṣā kara—accept lunch; kahe—says; vinati kariyā—with great submission.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya then caught hold of the Lord's lotus feet and submissively begged,"Please accept lunch for at least ten days."
